entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 8:13 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:13 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
